accountSecurity.bindPhoneNumberDescription: After binding your mobile phone number, you can use it to log in next time.
accountSecurity.pleaseFillInPhoneNumber: Please fill in your phone number
accountSecurity.changePasswordDescription: After modification, you can log in with the new password.
accountSecurity.passwordRequirements: The password must be a combination of 8-16 English letters, numbers, and characters (not pure numbers)
accountSecurity.deleteAccountWarning: After deletion, all your data will be cleared and cannot be restored. Are you sure you want to delete your account?
accountSecurity.deviceManagementDescription: You can delete a device from the list. After deleting it, you will need to verify your identity when logging in with that device.

systemSettings.logoutWarning: Are you sure you want to logout?
systemSettings.clearCacheWarning: The cache contains attachments. Clearing the cache will free up your computer's storage space. This operation is secure and reliable, and will not lose your personal and group chat records.
systemSettings.clearChatHistoryWarning: All chat history will be cleared. Are you sure you want to clear all personal and group chat history?
